right_result:
<?php

class CurlDownloader {
    private $tempDir;
    private $outputFile;

    public function __construct() {
        $this->tempDir = sys_get_temp_dir();
    }

    public function setTempDir(string $tempDir): void {
        if (!is_dir($tempDir)) {
            throw new ErrorException("Directory does not exist: $tempDir");
        }
        $this->tempDir = rtrim($tempDir, DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR);
    }

    public function download(string $url): bool {
        if (!filter_var($url, FILTER_VALIDATE_URL)) {
            throw new ErrorException("Invalid URL provided: $url");
        }

        $filename = basename(parse_url($url, PHP_URL_PATH));
        if (empty($filename)) {
            $filename = uniqid('download_', true);
        }

        $this->outputFile = $this->tempDir . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $filename;

        $fp = fopen($this->outputFile, 'w+');
        if ($fp === false) {
            throw new ErrorException("Failed to create temporary file: $this->outputFile");
        }

        $ch = curl_init($url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FILE, $fp);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, false);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 30);

        $result = curl_exec($ch);
        if ($result === false) {
            fclose($fp);
            unlink($this->outputFile);
            throw new ErrorException("cURL error: " . curl_error($ch));
        }

        $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        if ($httpCode !== 200) {
            fclose($fp);
            unlink($this->outputFile);
            throw new ErrorException("HTTP request failed with code: $httpCode");
        }

        curl_close($ch);
        fclose($fp);

        return true;
    }

    public function getFilename(): string {
        if (!isset($this->outputFile)) {
            throw new ErrorException("No file has been downloaded yet");
        }
        return $this->outputFile;
    }

    public function cleanup(): void {
        if (isset($this->outputFile) && file_exists($this->outputFile)) {
            unlink($this->outputFile);
        }
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP HTTP client class that handles various types of HTTP requests (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, multipart POST) using cURL, with proper error handling and response processing.

Class Description: The Client class provides static methods to send HTTP requests and process responses. It handles request construction, cURL session management, response parsing, and error handling.

Attributes: (This class has no instance attributes as all methods are static)

Methods:

1. get(string $url, array $headers = array()) -> Response
   - Sends a GET request to the specified URL with optional headers
   - Returns a Response object containing status code, headers, body, and timing information

2. delete(string $url, array $headers = array()) -> Response
   - Sends a DELETE request to the specified URL with optional headers
   - Returns a Response object

3. post(string $url, mixed $body, array $headers = array()) -> Response
   - Sends a POST request with body content to the specified URL
   - Returns a Response object

4. put(string $url, mixed $body, array $headers = array()) -> Response
   - Sends a PUT request with body content to the specified URL
   - Returns a Response object

5. multipartPost(
     string $url,
     array $fields,
     string $name,
     string $fileName,
     string $fileBody,
     string $mimeType = null,
     array $headers = array()
   ) -> Response
   - Sends a multipart/form-data POST request with file upload
   - Returns a Response object

6. sendRequest(Request $request) -> Response
   - Internal method that executes the cURL request
   - Handles cURL initialization, option setting, execution, and cleanup
   - Returns a Response object with request results

7. userAgent() -> string
   - Generates a User-Agent string with SDK, system, and PHP version information
   - Returns the formatted User-Agent string

8. parseHeaders(string $raw) -> array
   - Parses raw HTTP response headers into an associative array
   - Returns array of headers with normalized keys

9. escapeQuotes(string $str) -> string
   - Escapes quotes in a string for use in multipart form data
   - Returns the escaped string

10. ucwordsHyphen(string $str) -> string
    - Converts hyphenated header names to proper case (e.g., 'content-type' becomes 'Content-Type')
    - Returns the properly cased string
right_result:
<?php
class Client {
    public static function get(string $url, array $headers = array()) {
        $request = new Request('GET', $url, null, $headers);
        return self::sendRequest($request);
    }

    public static function delete(string $url, array $headers = array()) {
        $request = new Request('DELETE', $url, null, $headers);
        return self::sendRequest($request);
    }

    public static function post(string $url, $body, array $headers = array()) {
        $request = new Request('POST', $url, $body, $headers);
        return self::sendRequest($request);
    }

    public static function put(string $url, $body, array $headers = array()) {
        $request = new Request('PUT', $url, $body, $headers);
        return self::sendRequest($request);
    }

    public static function multipartPost(
        string $url,
        array $fields,
        string $name,
        string $fileName,
        string $fileBody,
        string $mimeType = null,
        array $headers = array()
    ) {
        $boundary = uniqid();
        $headers[] = 'Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=' . $boundary;
        $body = '';

        foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
            $body .= "--$boundary\r\n";
            $body .= "Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\"" . self::escapeQuotes($key) . "\"\r\n\r\n";
            $body .= self::escapeQuotes($value) . "\r\n";
        }

        $body .= "--$boundary\r\n";
        $body .= "Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\"" . self::escapeQuotes($name) . "\"; filename=\"" . self::escapeQuotes($fileName) . "\"\r\n";
        if ($mimeType) {
            $body .= "Content-Type: $mimeType\r\n";
        }
        $body .= "\r\n" . $fileBody . "\r\n";
        $body .= "--$boundary--\r\n";

        $request = new Request('POST', $url, $body, $headers);
        return self::sendRequest($request);
    }

    public static function sendRequest(Request $request) {
        $ch = curl_init();
        $options = [
            CURLOPT_URL => $request->url,
            CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => $request->method,
            CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
            CURLOPT_HEADER => true,
            CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => $request->headers,
            CURLOPT_USERAGENT => self::userAgent(),
        ];

        if ($request->body !== null) {
            $options[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = $request->body;
        }

        curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $error = curl_error($ch);
        $info = curl_getinfo($ch);
        curl_close($ch);

        if ($error) {
            throw new \RuntimeException("cURL error: $error");
        }

        $headerSize = $info['header_size'];
        $rawHeaders = substr($response, 0, $headerSize);
        $body = substr($response, $headerSize);
        $headers = self::parseHeaders($rawHeaders);

        return new Response($info['http_code'], $headers, $body, $info);
    }

    public static function userAgent() {
        $sdkVersion = '1.0.0';
        $os = php_uname('s') . ' ' . php_uname('r');
        $phpVersion = PHP_VERSION;
        return "SDK/$sdkVersion ($os) PHP/$phpVersion";
    }

    public static function parseHeaders(string $raw) {
        $headers = [];
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $raw);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $line, 2);
                $key = self::ucwordsHyphen(trim($key));
                $headers[$key] = trim($value);
            }
        }
        return $headers;
    }

    public static function escapeQuotes(string $str) {
        return str_replace('"', '\\"', $str);
    }

    public static function ucwordsHyphen(string $str) {
        return str_replace(' ', '-', ucwords(str_replace('-', ' ', $str)));
    }
}

class Request {
    public $method;
    public $url;
    public $body;
    public $headers;

    public function __construct(string $method, string $url, $body = null, array $headers = []) {
        $this->method = $method;
        $this->url = $url;
        $this->body = $body;
        $this->headers = $headers;
    }
}

class Response {
    public $statusCode;
    public $headers;
    public $body;
    public $info;

    public function __construct(int $statusCode, array $headers, $body, array $info) {
        $this->statusCode = $statusCode;
        $this->headers = $headers;
        $this->body = $body;
        $this->info = $info;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP function that uploads a file to a cloud storage service using cURL with PUT method, including authentication and proper headers.

Function Description: The function `dogcloud_upload` uploads a specified file to DogeCloud's object storage service. It handles authentication using HMAC-SHA1, sets appropriate headers including content type, and manages the file upload via HTTP PUT request. The function checks file existence before proceeding with the upload.

Input:
- $object (string): The target path/name for the uploaded file in the cloud storage
- $file (string): Local path to the file to be uploaded
- $mime (string): MIME type of the file being uploaded

Output:
- Returns the API response on successful upload (string)
- Returns false if the file doesn't exist or if upload fails (boolean)
right_result:
<?php
function dogcloud_upload($object, $file, $mime) {
    if (!file_exists($file)) {
        return false;
    }

    $accessKey = 'YOUR_ACCESS_KEY';
    $secretKey = 'YOUR_SECRET_KEY';
    $bucket = 'YOUR_BUCKET_NAME';
    $endpoint = 'https://api.dogecloud.com';

    $date = gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s T');
    $contentLength = filesize($file);
    $contentMd5 = base64_encode(md5_file($file, true));
    $canonicalizedResource = "/$bucket/$object";
    $stringToSign = "PUT\n$contentMd5\n$mime\n$date\n$canonicalizedResource";
    $signature = base64_encode(hash_hmac('sha1', $stringToSign, $secretKey, true));

    $headers = array(
        "Authorization: TOKEN $accessKey:$signature",
        "Date: $date",
        "Content-Type: $mime",
        "Content-Length: $contentLength",
        "Content-MD5: $contentMd5"
    );

    $ch = curl_init();
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, "$endpoint$canonicalizedResource");
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_PUT, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_INFILE, fopen($file, 'r'));
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $contentLength);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

    $response = curl_exec($ch);
    $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
    curl_close($ch);

    return ($httpCode >= 200 && $httpCode < 300) ? $response : false;
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a file downloader class in PHP that supports both regular and resumable downloads using either fopen or cURL, with proper error handling and support for gzip-compressed files.

Class Description: The Downloader class provides functionality to download files from URLs with support for resuming interrupted downloads. It handles both HTTP and HTTPS protocols, checks for server-side range support, and manages temporary files during download.

Attributes: (This class doesn't have explicit attributes as it uses static methods)

Methods:

Method1: start(string|array $url, string $saveFile, int $timeout = 10) -> array - Main entry point that initiates the download process. Checks URL validity and determines the best download method (fopen or cURL) based on server capabilities.

Method2: fileDownloadFopen(string $url, string $fileName, int $headerSize = 0) -> array - Downloads a file using PHP's fopen function. Handles basic downloads when range requests aren't supported.

Method3: fileDownloadCurl(string $url, string $fileName, bool $supportRange = false, int $existsLength = 0, int $length = 0) -> array - Downloads a file using cURL with support for resumable downloads if the server supports range requests.

Method4: checkGzip(string $file) -> void - Checks if a file is gzip-compressed and decompresses it if necessary. This is an internal helper method.
right_result:
<?php
class Downloader {
    public static function start($url, $saveFile, $timeout = 10) {
        if (is_array($url)) {
            $url = $url[array_rand($url)];
        }

        if (!filter_var($url, FILTER_VALIDATE_URL)) {
            return ['success' => false, 'error' => 'Invalid URL'];
        }

        $tempFile = $saveFile . '.part';
        $existsLength = file_exists($tempFile) ? filesize($tempFile) : 0;

        $ch = curl_init($url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_NOBODY, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $timeout);
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $headerSize = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $headers = substr($response, 0, $headerSize);
        curl_close($ch);

        if ($httpCode != 200 && $httpCode != 206) {
            return ['success' => false, 'error' => 'HTTP error: ' . $httpCode];
        }

        $supportRange = strpos($headers, 'Accept-Ranges: bytes') !== false || strpos($headers, 'Content-Range: bytes') !== false;
        $contentLength = 0;
        if (preg_match('/Content-Length: (\d+)/', $headers, $matches)) {
            $contentLength = $matches[1];
        }

        if (function_exists('curl_init') && $supportRange) {
            return self::fileDownloadCurl($url, $tempFile, $supportRange, $existsLength, $contentLength);
        } else {
            return self::fileDownloadFopen($url, $tempFile, $existsLength);
        }
    }

    public static function fileDownloadFopen($url, $fileName, $headerSize = 0) {
        $context = stream_context_create(['http' => ['timeout' => 30]]);
        $remote = fopen($url, 'rb', false, $context);
        if (!$remote) {
            return ['success' => false, 'error' => 'Failed to open remote file'];
        }

        $local = fopen($fileName, $headerSize > 0 ? 'ab' : 'wb');
        if (!$local) {
            fclose($remote);
            return ['success' => false, 'error' => 'Failed to create local file'];
        }

        stream_set_timeout($remote, 300);
        $bytesCopied = stream_copy_to_stream($remote, $local);
        fclose($remote);
        fclose($local);

        if ($bytesCopied === false) {
            return ['success' => false, 'error' => 'Failed to copy file contents'];
        }

        self::checkGzip($fileName);
        return ['success' => true, 'bytes' => $bytesCopied];
    }

    public static function fileDownloadCurl($url, $fileName, $supportRange = false, $existsLength = 0, $length = 0) {
        $fp = fopen($fileName, $existsLength > 0 ? 'ab' : 'wb');
        if (!$fp) {
            return ['success' => false, 'error' => 'Failed to create local file'];
        }

        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FILE, $fp);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 300);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);

        if ($supportRange && $existsLength > 0) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RANGE, $existsLength . '-');
        }

        $result = curl_exec($ch);
        $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $downloaded = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_SIZE_DOWNLOAD);
        $error = curl_error($ch);
        curl_close($ch);
        fclose($fp);

        if ($result === false || ($httpCode != 200 && $httpCode != 206)) {
            return ['success' => false, 'error' => $error ?: 'HTTP error: ' . $httpCode];
        }

        self::checkGzip($fileName);
        return ['success' => true, 'bytes' => $downloaded];
    }

    public static function checkGzip($file) {
        $content = file_get_contents($file, false, null, 0, 2);
        if ($content === "\x1f\x8b") {
            $gz = gzopen($file, 'rb');
            $decompressed = '';
            while (!gzeof($gz)) {
                $decompressed .= gzread($gz, 8192);
            }
            gzclose($gz);
            file_put_contents($file, $decompressed);
        }
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class for handling HTTP requests using cURL with support for various HTTP methods, streaming, authentication, and proxy configuration.

Class Description: The BcsRequestcore class provides a comprehensive wrapper around PHP's cURL functions to handle HTTP requests. It supports GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, and HEAD methods, with features for request customization, streaming uploads/downloads, authentication, and proxy support. The class manages the entire request lifecycle including preparation, execution, and response processing.

Attributes:

request_url: [string] - The URL to send the request to
request_headers: [array] - Associative array of request headers
request_body: [string] - The request body content
response: [mixed] - The raw response from the server
response_headers: [array] - Parsed response headers
response_body: [string] - The response body content
response_code: [int] - HTTP response status code
response_info: [array] - Additional response information
curl_handle: [resource] - The cURL handle resource
method: [string] - HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD)
proxy: [array|null] - Proxy configuration details
username: [string|null] - Authentication username
password: [string|null] - Authentication password
curlopts: [array|null] - Additional cURL options
debug_mode: [bool] - Flag for debug mode
request_class: [string] - Class name for request handling
response_class: [string] - Class name for response handling
useragent: [string] - User agent string
read_file: [string|null] - File path for streaming read
read_stream: [resource|null] - Stream resource for reading
read_stream_size: [int|null] - Size of read stream
read_stream_read: [int] - Bytes read from stream
write_file: [string|null] - File path for streaming write
write_stream: [resource|null] - Stream resource for writing
seek_position: [int|null] - Seek position for streams
registered_streaming_read_callback: [callable|null] - Callback for streaming read
registered_streaming_write_callback: [callable|null] - Callback for streaming write

Methods:

__construct([string|null $url], [array|null $proxy], [array|null $helpers]) -> [self] - Initializes the request object with optional URL, proxy, and helper classes
__destruct() -> [self] - Cleans up any open file handles
setCredentials([string $user], [string $pass]) -> [self] - Sets basic authentication credentials
addHeader([string $key], [string $value]) -> [self] - Adds a request header
removeHeader([string $key]) -> [self] - Removes a request header
setMethod([string $method]) -> [self] - Sets the HTTP method
setUseragent([string $ua]) -> [self] - Sets the user agent string
setBody([string $body]) -> [self] - Sets the request body
setRequestUrl([string $url]) -> [self] - Sets the request URL
setCurlopts([array $curlopts]) -> [self] - Sets additional cURL options
setReadStreamSize([int $size]) -> [self] - Sets the read stream size
setReadStream([resource $resource], [int|null $size]) -> [self] - Sets a stream resource for reading
setReadFile([string $location]) -> [self] - Sets a file for streaming read
setWriteStream([resource $resource]) -> [self] - Sets a stream resource for writing
setWriteFile([string $location]) -> [self] - Sets a file for streaming write
setProxy([string $proxy]) -> [self] - Configures proxy settings
setSeekPosition([int|null $position]) -> [self] - Sets the seek position for streams
registerStreamingReadCallback([callable $callback]) -> [self] - Registers a streaming read callback
registerStreamingWriteCallback([callable $callback]) -> [self] - Registers a streaming write callback
prepRequest() -> [resource] - Prepares and returns a cURL handle with configured options
sendRequest([bool $parse = false]) -> [mixed] - Executes the request and returns response
processResponse([resource|null $curl_handle], [mixed|null $response]) -> [mixed] - Processes the response into headers and body
isBaeEnv() -> [bool] - Checks if running in Baidu App Engine environment
getResponseHeader([string|null $header]) -> [mixed] - Gets specific or all response headers
getResponseBody() -> [string] - Gets the response body
getResponseCode() -> [int] - Gets the HTTP response code
right_result:
<?php
class BcsRequestcore
{
    public $request_url;
    public $request_headers = array();
    public $request_body;
    public $response;
    public $response_headers = array();
    public $response_body;
    public $response_code;
    public $response_info;
    public $curl_handle;
    public $method = 'GET';
    public $proxy = null;
    public $username = null;
    public $password = null;
    public $curlopts = null;
    public $debug_mode = false;
    public $request_class = 'BcsRequestcore';
    public $response_class = 'BcsRequestcore';
    public $useragent = 'BcsRequestcore/1.0';
    public $read_file = null;
    public $read_stream = null;
    public $read_stream_size = null;
    public $read_stream_read = 0;
    public $write_file = null;
    public $write_stream = null;
    public $seek_position = null;
    public $registered_streaming_read_callback = null;
    public $registered_streaming_write_callback = null;

    public function __construct($url = null, $proxy = null, $helpers = null)
    {
        if ($url) $this->setRequestUrl($url);
        if ($proxy) $this->setProxy($proxy);
    }

    public function __destruct()
    {
        if (isset($this->read_file) && isset($this->read_stream)) {
            fclose($this->read_stream);
        }
        if (isset($this->write_file) && isset($this->write_stream)) {
            fclose($this->write_stream);
        }
    }

    public function setCredentials($user, $pass)
    {
        $this->username = $user;
        $this->password = $pass;
        return $this;
    }

    public function addHeader($key, $value)
    {
        $this->request_headers[$key] = $value;
        return $this;
    }

    public function removeHeader($key)
    {
        if (isset($this->request_headers[$key])) {
            unset($this->request_headers[$key]);
        }
        return $this;
    }

    public function setMethod($method)
    {
        $this->method = strtoupper($method);
        return $this;
    }

    public function setUseragent($ua)
    {
        $this->useragent = $ua;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setBody($body)
    {
        $this->request_body = $body;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setRequestUrl($url)
    {
        $this->request_url = $url;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setCurlopts($curlopts)
    {
        $this->curlopts = $curlopts;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setReadStreamSize($size)
    {
        $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setReadStream($resource, $size = null)
    {
        $this->read_stream = $resource;
        if ($size) $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setReadFile($location)
    {
        $this->read_file = $location;
        $this->read_stream = fopen($location, 'r');
        if ($this->read_stream !== false && $this->read_stream_size === null) {
            $stats = fstat($this->read_stream);
            $this->read_stream_size = $stats['size'];
        }
        return $this;
    }

    public function setWriteStream($resource)
    {
        $this->write_stream = $resource;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setWriteFile($location)
    {
        $this->write_file = $location;
        $this->write_stream = fopen($location, 'w');
        return $this;
    }

    public function setProxy($proxy)
    {
        $this->proxy = $proxy;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setSeekPosition($position)
    {
        $this->seek_position = $position;
        return $this;
    }

    public function registerStreamingReadCallback($callback)
    {
        $this->registered_streaming_read_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function registerStreamingWriteCallback($callback)
    {
        $this->registered_streaming_write_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function prepRequest()
    {
        $curl_handle = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILETIME, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_FRESH_CONNECT, false);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CLOSEPOLICY, CURLCLOSEPOLICY_LEAST_RECENTLY_USED);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS, 5);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 5184000);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, 120);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOSIGNAL, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_REFERER, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION, CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1);

        if ($this->debug_mode) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, true);
        }

        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPPROXYTUNNEL, true);
            $proxy = is_array($this->proxy) ? $this->proxy['uri'] : $this->proxy;
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXY, $proxy);
            if (isset($this->proxy['username']) && isset($this->proxy['password'])) {
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXYUSERPWD, $this->proxy['username'] . ':' . $this->proxy['password']);
            }
        }

        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_ANY);
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, $this->username . ':' . $this->password);
        }

        if (extension_loaded('zlib')) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_ENCODING, '');
        }

        if ($this->seek_position !== null) {
            fseek($this->read_stream, $this->seek_position);
        }

        if ($this->method === 'PUT' || $this->method === 'POST') {
            if ($this->read_stream) {
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_PUT, true);
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILE, $this->read_stream);
                if ($this->read_stream_size !== null) {
                    curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
                }
            } else {
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_POST, true);
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
            }
        } elseif ($this->method === 'HEAD') {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOBODY, true);
        } elseif ($this->method === 'DELETE') {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
        }

        if ($this->write_stream) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILE, $this->write_stream);
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HEADER, false);
        } elseif ($this->write_file) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILE, $this->write_stream);
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HEADER, false);
        }

        if ($this->registered_streaming_read_callback) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, $this->registered_streaming_read_callback);
        }

        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, $this->registered_streaming_write_callback);
        }

        if ($this->request_headers) {
            $headers = array();
            foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {
                $headers[] = $key . ': ' . $value;
            }
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        }

        if ($this->curlopts) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $key => $value) {
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, $key, $value);
            }
        }

        $this->curl_handle = $curl_handle;
        return $curl_handle;
    }

    public function sendRequest($parse = false)
    {
        $this->prepRequest();
        $this->response = curl_exec($this->curl_handle);
        $this->processResponse($this->curl_handle, $this->response);
        curl_close($this->curl_handle);
        return $parse ? $this->response_body : $this->response;
    }

    public function processResponse($curl_handle = null, $response = null)
    {
        if ($curl_handle === null) $curl_handle = $this->curl_handle;
        if ($response === null) $response = $this->response;

        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
        $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

        $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $headers = substr($response, 0, $header_size);
        $this->response_headers = $this->parseHeaders($headers);
        $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);

        return $this->response_body;
    }

    protected function parseHeaders($headers)
    {
        $headers = preg_split("/\r\n|\n|\r/", $headers);
        $parsed = array();
        foreach ($headers as $header) {
            if (strpos($header, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $header, 2);
                $parsed[trim($key)] = trim($value);
            } elseif (preg_match('#HTTP/[0-9\.]+\s+([0-9]+)#', $header, $matches)) {
                $parsed['Status'] = $matches[1];
            }
        }
        return $parsed;
    }

    public function isBaeEnv()
    {
        return isset($_SERVER['HTTP_BAE_ENV_APPID']);
    }

    public function getResponseHeader($header = null)
    {
        if ($header) {
            return isset($this->response_headers[$header]) ? $this->response_headers[$header] : null;
        }
        return $this->response_headers;
    }

    public function getResponseBody()
    {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function getResponseCode()
    {
        return $this->response_code;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements a simple HTTP client using cURL for making GET requests, with configurable options and proper error handling.

Class Description: The SimpleHttpClient class provides functionality to send HTTP GET requests using PHP's cURL extension. It includes default cURL options that can be customized, handles errors appropriately, and parses the response into status code, headers, and body.

Attributes:

curlOptions: [array] - An associative array of default cURL options including settings for headers, redirects, timeouts, and response handling.

Methods:

httpGet: [Name]($url, $options) -> [array] - Sends an HTTP GET request to the specified URL with optional configuration. Returns an associative array containing the response status code, headers, and body.
- Parameters:
  - $url: [string] - The target URL for the GET request
  - $options: [array] - Optional configuration array (currently only supports 'timeout' override)
- Return: [array] - Associative array with keys: 'statusCode' (int), 'headers' (array), and 'body' (string)
- Throws: RuntimeException when cURL encounters an error
right_result:
<?php
class SimpleHttpClient {
    private $curlOptions = [
        CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
        CURLOPT_HEADER => true,
        CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
        CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
        CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
        CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
            'Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8',
            'Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5',
            'Connection: keep-alive'
        ]
    ];

    public function httpGet($url, $options = []) {
        $ch = curl_init($url);

        $finalOptions = $this->curlOptions;
        if (isset($options['timeout'])) {
            $finalOptions[CURLOPT_TIMEOUT] = $options['timeout'];
        }

        curl_setopt_array($ch, $finalOptions);

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if ($response === false) {
            $error = curl_error($ch);
            curl_close($ch);
            throw new RuntimeException("cURL error: " . $error);
        }

        $statusCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $headerSize = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $headers = substr($response, 0, $headerSize);
        $body = substr($response, $headerSize);

        curl_close($ch);

        $parsedHeaders = [];
        $headerLines = explode("\r\n", trim($headers));
        foreach ($headerLines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $line, 2);
                $parsedHeaders[trim($key)] = trim($value);
            }
        }

        return [
            'statusCode' => $statusCode,
            'headers' => $parsedHeaders,
            'body' => $body
        ];
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a class for interacting with Baidu Cloud Storage (BCS) using HTTP requests through cURL in PHP, handling file uploads, downloads, and other operations with proper error handling and response parsing.

Class Description: The Bcs class provides an interface to interact with Baidu Cloud Storage (BCS) service. It handles authentication, HTTP requests, and response processing for various operations on cloud storage.

Attributes:
- rootPath: [string] - The root path for storage operations
- error: [string] - Stores the last error message encountered
- config: [array] - Configuration array containing AccessKey, SecretKey, bucket, rename, and timeout settings
- bcs: [BaiduBCS|null] - Instance of the BaiduBCS client

Methods:
- __construct([array $config]) -> [void] - Initializes the BCS client with configuration including AccessKey, SecretKey, and other settings
- request([string $path], [string $method], [array|null $headers], [mixed $body]) -> [mixed] - Makes an HTTP request to BCS service and processes the response
- response([string $text]) -> [array] - Parses the JSON response from BCS into an array
- error([string $header]) -> [void] - Processes error responses from BCS and sets the error message

The request method specifically handles:
1. Initializing cURL session
2. Setting request headers and body
3. Configuring request method (GET, POST, PUT, HEAD)
4. Executing the request
5. Processing response and errors
6. Cleaning up resources
right_result:
<?php
class Bcs {
    protected $rootPath;
    protected $error;
    protected $config;
    protected $bcs;

    public function __construct($config = array()) {
        $this->config = array_merge(array(
            'AccessKey' => '',
            'SecretKey' => '',
            'bucket' => '',
            'rename' => false,
            'timeout' => 3600
        ), $config);

        if (!empty($this->config['AccessKey']) && !empty($this->config['SecretKey'])) {
            require_once 'BaiduBCS.class.php';
            $this->bcs = new BaiduBCS(
                $this->config['AccessKey'],
                $this->config['SecretKey'],
                $this->config['bucket']
            );
        }
    }

    public function request($path, $method = 'GET', $headers = null, $body = null) {
        $url = $this->rootPath . ltrim($path, '/');
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $this->config['timeout']);

        if ($headers) {
            $headerArr = array();
            foreach ($headers as $k => $v) {
                $headerArr[] = $k . ': ' . $v;
            }
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headerArr);
        }

        switch (strtoupper($method)) {
            case 'POST':
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
                break;
            case 'PUT':
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PUT');
                break;
            case 'HEAD':
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_NOBODY, true);
                break;
            default:
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPGET, true);
        }

        if (!is_null($body)) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $body);
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $errno = curl_errno($ch);
        if ($errno) {
            $this->error = curl_error($ch);
            curl_close($ch);
            return false;
        }

        $headerSize = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $header = substr($response, 0, $headerSize);
        $body = substr($response, $headerSize);

        $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        curl_close($ch);

        if ($httpCode >= 400) {
            $this->error($header);
            return false;
        }

        return $this->response($body);
    }

    public function response($text) {
        $data = json_decode($text, true);
        if (json_last_error() !== JSON_ERROR_NONE) {
            $this->error = 'JSON parse error';
            return false;
        }
        return $data;
    }

    public function error($header) {
        $headers = explode("\r\n", $header);
        foreach ($headers as $h) {
            if (strpos($h, 'x-bs-error-message:') === 0) {
                $this->error = trim(substr($h, 19));
                break;
            }
        }
        if (empty($this->error)) {
            $this->error = 'Unknown error';
        }
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that utilizes the Guzzle HTTP client to synchronize video processing tasks with a remote API endpoint, handling request signing and response parsing.

Class Description: The SyncVideo class provides functionality to send video processing requests to a remote API endpoint using HTTP POST requests. It handles request signing, timeout configuration, and response parsing.

Attributes:
- config: [Upyun\Config] - Configuration object containing service credentials, timeout settings, and endpoint information

Methods:
- __construct(Config $config) -> [void] - Initializes the class with the provided configuration object
- process(array $params, string $path) -> [array] - Sends a synchronized video processing request to the specified path with the given parameters, returns the parsed JSON response
right_result:
<?php

use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\RequestException;

class SyncVideo
{
    private $config;
    private $client;

    public function __construct($config)
    {
        $this->config = $config;
        $this->client = new Client([
            'base_uri' => $this->config->getEndpoint(),
            'timeout' => $this->config->getTimeout(),
        ]);
    }

    public function process($params, $path)
    {
        $method = 'POST';
        $date = gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s \G\M\T');
        $signature = $this->generateSignature($method, $path, $date);

        try {
            $response = $this->client->request($method, $path, [
                'headers' => [
                    'Authorization' => $signature,
                    'Date' => $date,
                    'Content-Type' => 'application/json'
                ],
                'json' => $params
            ]);

            return json_decode($response->getBody(), true);
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            throw new \RuntimeException('API request failed: ' . $e->getMessage());
        }
    }

    private function generateSignature($method, $path, $date)
    {
        $secret = $this->config->getSecret();
        $signString = "{$method}&{$path}&{$date}";
        $signature = base64_encode(hash_hmac('sha1', $signString, $secret, true));
        return "UPYUN {$this->config->getOperator()}:{$signature}";
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that handles interactions with the Alipay API, specifically for processing settlements and generating required signatures for secure communication.

Class Description: The AlipayService class provides functionality to interact with Alipay's payment gateway, focusing on settlement operations. It handles request configuration, signature generation, and HTTP communication using cURL.

Attributes:
- appId: [string] - The application ID for Alipay API
- charset: [string] - Character encoding (default: 'utf-8')
- notifyUrl: [string] - Notification URL for callbacks
- rsaPrivateKey: [string] - RSA private key for signing requests
- totalFee: [float] - Total amount for the transaction
- outTradeNo: [string] - Merchant's unique order number
- orderName: [string] - Description of the order
- tradeNo: [string] - Alipay's transaction number
- tranOut: [string] - Account transferring funds
- tranIn: [string] - Account receiving funds
- amountPercentage: [float] - Percentage of amount to transfer

Methods:
- __construct() -> [void] - Initializes the class with default charset
- setAppid($appid) -> [void] - Sets the Alipay application ID
- setTradeNo($tradeNo) -> [void] - Sets the Alipay transaction number
- setTranOut($tranOut) -> [void] - Sets the transferring account
- setTranIn($tranIn) -> [void] - Sets the receiving account
- setRsaPrivateKey($rsaPrivateKey) -> [void] - Sets the RSA private key
- setTotalFee($payAmount) -> [void] - Sets the transaction amount
- setOutTradeNo($outTradeNo) -> [void] - Sets the merchant order number
- doSettle() -> [array] - Executes the settlement request to Alipay
- generateSign($params, $signType = "RSA") -> [string] - Generates signature for request
- sign($data, $signType = "RSA") -> [string] - Creates RSA signature
- checkEmpty($value) -> [bool] - Checks if a value is empty
- getSignContent($params) -> [string] - Prepares content for signing
- characet($data, $targetCharset) -> [string] - Handles character encoding conversion
- curlPost($url = '', $postData = '', $options = array()) -> [string] - Executes HTTP POST request using cURL
right_result:
<?php
class AlipayService {
    protected $appId;
    protected $charset = 'utf-8';
    protected $notifyUrl;
    protected $rsaPrivateKey;
    protected $totalFee;
    protected $outTradeNo;
    protected $orderName;
    protected $tradeNo;
    protected $tranOut;
    protected $tranIn;
    protected $amountPercentage;

    public function __construct() {
        $this->charset = 'utf-8';
    }

    public function setAppid($appid) {
        $this->appId = $appid;
    }

    public function setTradeNo($tradeNo) {
        $this->tradeNo = $tradeNo;
    }

    public function setTranOut($tranOut) {
        $this->tranOut = $tranOut;
    }

    public function setTranIn($tranIn) {
        $this->tranIn = $tranIn;
    }

    public function setRsaPrivateKey($rsaPrivateKey) {
        $this->rsaPrivateKey = $rsaPrivateKey;
    }

    public function setTotalFee($payAmount) {
        $this->totalFee = $payAmount;
    }

    public function setOutTradeNo($outTradeNo) {
        $this->outTradeNo = $outTradeNo;
    }

    public function doSettle() {
        $bizContent = [
            'out_request_no' => $this->outTradeNo,
            'trade_no' => $this->tradeNo,
            'trans_out' => $this->tranOut,
            'trans_in' => $this->tranIn,
            'amount' => $this->totalFee,
            'amount_percentage' => $this->amountPercentage
        ];

        $params = [
            'app_id' => $this->appId,
            'method' => 'alipay.trade.order.settle',
            'charset' => $this->charset,
            'sign_type' => 'RSA',
            'timestamp' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s'),
            'version' => '1.0',
            'biz_content' => json_encode($bizContent)
        ];

        $params['sign'] = $this->generateSign($params);

        $url = 'https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do';
        $result = $this->curlPost($url, http_build_query($params));
        return json_decode($result, true);
    }

    public function generateSign($params, $signType = "RSA") {
        return $this->sign($this->getSignContent($params), $signType);
    }

    protected function sign($data, $signType = "RSA") {
        $res = "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\n" .
            wordwrap($this->rsaPrivateKey, 64, "\n", true) .
            "\n-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----";

        openssl_sign($data, $sign, $res, OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA256);
        return base64_encode($sign);
    }

    protected function checkEmpty($value) {
        if (!isset($value))
            return true;
        if ($value === null)
            return true;
        if (trim($value) === "")
            return true;
        return false;
    }

    protected function getSignContent($params) {
        ksort($params);
        $stringToBeSigned = "";
        $i = 0;
        foreach ($params as $k => $v) {
            if ($this->checkEmpty($v) {
                continue;
            }
            if ($i == 0) {
                $stringToBeSigned .= "$k" . "=" . "$v";
            } else {
                $stringToBeSigned .= "&" . "$k" . "=" . "$v";
            }
            $i++;
        }
        unset ($k, $v);
        return $stringToBeSigned;
    }

    protected function characet($data, $targetCharset) {
        if (!empty($data)) {
            $fileType = $this->charset;
            if (strcasecmp($fileType, $targetCharset) != 0) {
                $data = mb_convert_encoding($data, $targetCharset, $fileType);
            }
        }
        return $data;
    }

    protected function curlPost($url = '', $postData = '', $options = array()) {
        if (is_array($postData)) {
            $postData = http_build_query($postData);
        }
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postData);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 30);
        if (!empty($options)) {
            curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        }
        $data = curl_exec($ch);
        curl_close($ch);
        return $data;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements an HTTP client using cURL for making HTTP requests, handling cookies, headers, and connection management.

Class Description: HproseHttpClient is a PHP class that extends HproseBaseHttpClient to provide HTTP client functionality using cURL. It handles request sending, response processing, cookie management, and connection settings.

Attributes:
- curl: resource - The cURL session handle
- url: string - The target URL for HTTP requests
- header: array - Additional HTTP headers to be sent with requests
- keepAlive: bool - Whether to use keep-alive connection
- keepAliveTimeout: int - Timeout for keep-alive connection in seconds
- proxy: string - Proxy server address if configured
- timeout: int - Request timeout in milliseconds

Methods:
- __construct(string $url = '') -> void - Initializes the client with optional target URL and creates a cURL session
- formatCookie(array $cookies) -> string - Formats cookies into a header string
- send(string $request) -> string - Sends an HTTP request and returns the response body
  - Input: $request - The request payload to send
  - Output: The response body from the server
- __destruct() -> void - Cleans up by closing the cURL session

The class handles:
1. cURL session initialization and configuration
2. Request header construction (including cookies)
3. SSL verification settings
4. Connection management (keep-alive or close)
5. Proxy configuration
6. Timeout handling
7. Response processing and error checking
8. Resource cleanup
right_result:
<?php
class HproseHttpClient extends HproseBaseHttpClient {
    protected $curl;
    protected $url;
    protected $header = array();
    protected $keepAlive = false;
    protected $keepAliveTimeout = 300;
    protected $proxy = '';
    protected $timeout = 30000;

    public function __construct($url = '') {
        parent::__construct();
        $this->url = $url;
        $this->curl = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);
    }

    protected function formatCookie($cookies) {
        $cookieParts = array();
        foreach ($cookies as $name => $value) {
            $cookieParts[] = $name . '=' . $value;
        }
        return implode('; ', $cookieParts);
    }

    public function send($request) {
        $headers = $this->header;
        $headers[] = 'Content-Type: application/octet-stream';
        $headers[] = 'Content-Length: ' . strlen($request);

        if ($this->keepAlive) {
            $headers[] = 'Connection: keep-alive';
            $headers[] = 'Keep-Alive: timeout=' . $this->keepAliveTimeout;
        } else {
            $headers[] = 'Connection: close';
        }

        if (!empty($this->cookies)) {
            $headers[] = 'Cookie: ' . $this->formatCookie($this->cookies);
        }

        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_URL, $this->url);
        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $request);
        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT_MS, $this->timeout);

        if (!empty($this->proxy)) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->proxy);
        }

        $response = curl_exec($this->curl);
        if ($response === false) {
            throw new Exception(curl_error($this->curl), curl_errno($this->curl));
        }

        $headerSize = curl_getinfo($this->curl, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $headers = substr($response, 0, $headerSize);
        $response = substr($response, $headerSize);

        $this->parseCookie($headers);
        return $response;
    }

    public function __destruct() {
        if (is_resource($this->curl)) {
            curl_close($this->curl);
        }
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a function to download an image from a given URL and save it to a specified file path using PHP's cURL library.

Function Description: The function uses cURL to make an HTTP request to download an image from the provided URL. It saves the downloaded image to the specified file path. The function includes error handling for the cURL session and file operations.

Input:
- $url (string): The URL of the image to download
- $filepath (string): The local file path where the image should be saved

Output:
- void: The function does not return a value but outputs a success message when the download is complete
- The downloaded image is saved to the specified file path
- Errors during the download process are handled by cURL's error reporting
right_result:
<?php
function downloadImage($url, $filepath) {
    $ch = curl_init($url);
    $fp = fopen($filepath, 'wb');
    
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FILE, $fp);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
    
    $result = curl_exec($ch);
    
    if ($result === false) {
        throw new Exception('cURL error: ' . curl_error($ch));
    }
    
    $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
    if ($httpCode !== 200) {
        throw new Exception('HTTP error: ' . $httpCode);
    }
    
    curl_close($ch);
    fclose($fp);
    
    echo "Image downloaded successfully to: " . $filepath;
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class for making HTTP requests using cURL with support for various HTTP methods, streaming, authentication, and proxy configuration.

Class Description: The `baiduRequestCore` class provides a comprehensive wrapper around PHP's cURL functions to simplify HTTP requests. It supports GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, and HEAD methods, handles authentication, manages request/response headers and bodies, and includes streaming capabilities for both uploads and downloads.

Attributes:

request_url: [string] - The URL to send the request to
request_headers: [array] - Associative array of request headers

<?php
class baiduRequestCore
{
    public $request_url;
    public $request_headers = array();
    public $request_body;
    public $response;
    public $response_headers = array();
    public $response_body;
    public $response_code;
    public $response_info;
    public $curl_handle;
    public $method = 'GET';
    public $proxy = null;
    public $username = null;
    public $password = null;
    public $curlopts = null;
    public $debug_mode = false;
    public $request_class = 'baiduRequestCore';
    public $response_class = 'baiduRequestCore';
    public $useragent = 'baiduRequestCore/1.4.2';
    public $read_file = null;
    public $read_stream = null;
    public $read_stream_size = null;
    public $read_stream_read = 0;
    public $write_file = null;
    public $write_stream = null;
    public $seek_position = null;
    public $registered_streaming_read_callback = null;
    public $registered_streaming_write_callback = null;

    public function __construct($url = null, $proxy = null, $helpers = null)
    {
        if ($url) $this->request_url = $url;
        if ($proxy) $this->proxy = $proxy;
        if (is_array($helpers)) {
            if (isset($helpers['request']) && !empty($helpers['request'])) $this->request_class = $helpers['request'];
            if (isset($helpers['response']) && !empty($helpers['response'])) $this->response_class = $helpers['response'];
        }
    }

    public function __destruct()
    {
        if (isset($this->read_file) && isset($this->read_stream)) fclose($this->read_stream);
        if (isset($this->write_file) && isset($this->write_stream)) fclose($this->write_stream);
    }

    public function set_credentials($user, $pass)
    {
        $this->username = $user;
        $this->password = $pass;
        return $this;
    }

    public function add_header($key, $value)
    {
        $this->request_headers[$key] = $value;
        return $this;
    }

    public function remove_header($key)
    {
        if (isset($this->request_headers[$key])) unset($this->request_headers[$key]);
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_method($method)
    {
        $this->method = strtoupper($method);
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_useragent($ua)
    {
        $this->useragent = $ua;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_body($body)
    {
        $this->request_body = $body;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_request_url($url)
    {
        $this->request_url = $url;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_curlopts($curlopts)
    {
        $this->curlopts = $curlopts;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_stream_size($size)
    {
        $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_stream($resource, $size = null)
    {
        $this->read_stream = $resource;
        if ($size) $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_file($location)
    {
        $this->read_file = $location;
        $this->read_stream = fopen($location, 'rb');
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_write_stream($resource)
    {
        $this->write_stream = $resource;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_write_file($location)
    {
        $this->write_file = $location;
        $this->write_stream = fopen($location, 'wb');
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_proxy($proxy)
    {
        $this->proxy = $proxy;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_seek_position($position)
    {
        $this->seek_position = $position;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_read_callback($callback)
    {
        $this->registered_streaming_read_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_write_callback($callback)
    {
        $this->registered_streaming_write_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function streaming_read_callback($curl_handle, $file_handle, $length)
    {
        if ($this->read_stream_read >= $this->read_stream_size) return '';
        if ($this->seek_position !== null && $this->read_stream_read == 0) {
            fseek($this->read_stream, $this->seek_position);
        }
        $read = fread($this->read_stream, min($this->read_stream_size - $this->read_stream_read, $length));
        $this->read_stream_read += strlen($read);
        if ($this->registered_streaming_read_callback) {
            call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_read_callback, $curl_handle, $file_handle, $read);
        }
        return $read;
    }

    public function streaming_write_callback($curl_handle, $data)
    {
        $length = strlen($data);
        $written_total = 0;
        $written_last = 0;
        while ($written_total < $length) {
            $written_last = fwrite($this->write_stream, substr($data, $written_total));
            if ($written_last === false) return $written_total;
            $written_total += $written_last;
        }
        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_write_callback, $curl_handle, $data);
        }
        return $written_total;
    }

    public function prep_request()
    {
        $curl_handle = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILETIME, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_FRESH_CONNECT, false);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS, 5);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 5184000);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, 120);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOSIGNAL, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_REFERER, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, array($this, 'streaming_read_callback'));
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, array($this, 'streaming_write_callback'));
        if ($this->debug_mode) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, true);
        }
        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_ANY);
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, $this->username . ':' . $this->password);
        }
        if (extension_loaded('zlib')) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_ENCODING, '');
        }
        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPPROXYTUNNEL, true);
            $proxy = parse_url($this->proxy);
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXY, $proxy['host']);
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXYPORT, $proxy['port']);
            if (isset($proxy['user']) && isset($proxy['pass'])) {
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXYUSERPWD, $proxy['user'] . ':' . $proxy['pass']);
            }
        }
        $headers = array();
        foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {
            $headers[] = $key . ': ' . $value;
        }
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        switch ($this->method) {
            case 'PUT':
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PUT');
                if ($this->read_stream) {
                    curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_PUT, true);
                    curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILE, $this->read_stream);
                    if ($this->read_stream_size) {
                        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
                    }
                } else {
                    curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
                }
                break;
            case 'POST':
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_POST, true);
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
                break;
            case 'HEAD':
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'HEAD');
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOBODY, true);
                break;
            case 'DELETE':
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
                break;
            default:
                break;
        }
        if ($this->curlopts) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $key => $value) {
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, $key, $value);
            }
        }
        return $curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle = null, $response = null)
    {
        if ($curl_handle && $response === null) {
            $response = curl_exec($curl_handle);
            $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
            $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
            curl_close($curl_handle);
        }
        if ($response) {
            $this->response = $response;
            $header_size = $this->response_info['header_size'];
            $this->response_headers = substr($response, 0, $header_size);
            $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);
            $headers = explode("\r\n\r\n", trim($this->response_headers));
            $this->response_headers = array();
            foreach ($headers as $header) {
                $lines = explode("\r\n", $header);
                $header_array = array();
                foreach ($lines as $line) {
                    if (strpos($line, ': ') !== false) {
                        list($key, $value) = explode(': ', $line, 2);
                        $header_array[$key] = $value;
                    }
                }
                $this->response_headers[] = $header_array;
            }
            $this->response_headers = $this->response_headers[count($this->response_headers) - 1];
        }
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = false)
    {
        set_time_limit(0);
        $this->curl_handle = $this->prep_request();
        $this->response = curl_exec($this->curl_handle);
        $this->process_response($this->curl_handle, $this->response);
        if ($parse) {
            return $this->parse_response($this->response_body);
        }
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function get_response_header($header = null)
    {
        if ($header) {
            return isset($this->response_headers[$header]) ? $this->response_headers[$header] : null;
        }
        return $this->response_headers;
    }

    public function get_response_body()
    {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function get_response_code()
    {
        return $this->response_code;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that handles HTTP requests using cURL with file download capabilities, including error handling and size limitations.

Class Description: The timthumb class provides functionality to download files from URLs using cURL with progress tracking and size limitations. It includes error handling for common HTTP status codes and fallback to file_get_contents when cURL is not available.

Attributes:
- $curlFH: [resource|false] - File handle for writing downloaded data
- $curlDataWritten: [int] - Tracks the amount of data written during download
- $lastURLError: [string|false] - Stores the last error message encountered during URL fetching

Methods:
- curlWrite($h, $d): [int] - [Static callback function for cURL write operations. Writes data to file and tracks total size written. Returns 0 if size limit exceeded, otherwise returns bytes written]
  - $h: [resource] - cURL handle
  - $d: [string] - Data to write
  - Returns: [int] - Number of bytes processed

- getURL($url, $tempfile): [bool] - [Fetches content from URL and saves to temporary file. Uses cURL if available, falls back to file_get_contents. Handles HTTP errors and size limitations]
  - $url: [string] - URL to fetch
  - $tempfile: [string] - Path to temporary file for saving content
  - Returns: [bool] - True on success, False on failure
right_result:
<?php
class timthumb {
    protected $curlFH = false;
    protected $curlDataWritten = 0;
    protected $lastURLError = false;

    public static function curlWrite($h, $d) {
        $this = self::instance();
        $bytes = fwrite($this->curlFH, $d);
        if($bytes === false) {
            return 0;
        }
        $this->curlDataWritten += $bytes;
        if($this->curlDataWritten > timthumb::getMaxFileSize()){
            return 0;
        }
        return $bytes;
    }

    public function getURL($url, $tempfile) {
        $this->lastURLError = false;
        if(function_exists('curl_init')) {
            $this->curlDataWritten = 0;
            $this->curlFH = fopen($tempfile, 'w');
            if(!$this->curlFH) {
                $this->lastURLError = 'Could not open temp file: ' . $tempfile;
                return false;
            }
            $curl = curl_init($url);
            curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_FAILONERROR, true);
            curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
            curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
            curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);
            curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_BINARYTRANSFER, true);
            curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, timthumb::getCurlTimeout());
            curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, timthumb::getCurlTimeout());
            curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
            curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);
            curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, array('timthumb', 'curlWrite'));
            $curlResult = curl_exec($curl);
            fclose($this->curlFH);
            $httpStatus = curl_getinfo($curl, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
            if($httpStatus == 404) {
                $this->lastURLError = '404 File not found';
                return false;
            }
            if($httpStatus == 503) {
                $this->lastURLError = '503 Service unavailable';
                return false;
            }
            if($curlResult) {
                curl_close($curl);
                return true;
            } else {
                $this->lastURLError = curl_error($curl);
                curl_close($curl);
                return false;
            }
        } else {
            $img = @file_get_contents($url);
            if($img === false) {
                $err = error_get_last();
                if(is_array($err) && isset($err['message'])) {
                    $this->lastURLError = $err['message'];
                } else {
                    $this->lastURLError = 'Unknown error fetching URL';
                }
                return false;
            }
            if(!file_put_contents($tempfile, $img)) {
                $this->lastURLError = 'Could not write to file: ' . $tempfile;
                return false;
            }
            return true;
        }
    }

    protected static function instance() {
        static $instance = null;
        if($instance === null) {
            $instance = new timthumb();
        }
        return $instance;
    }

    protected static function getMaxFileSize() {
        return 10485760;
    }

    protected static function getCurlTimeout() {
        return 20;
    }
}
