isBaeEnv() -> [bool] - Checks if running in Baidu App Engine environment
get_response_header([string|null] $header) -> [mixed] - Gets response header(s)
get_response_body() -> [string] - Gets the response body
get_response_code() -> [int] - Gets the response status code
right_result:
<?php
class BCS_RequestCore
{
    public $request_url;
    public $request_headers = array();
    public $request_body;
    public $response;
    public $response_headers = array();
    public $response_body;
    public $response_code;
    public $response_info;
    public $curl_handle;
    public $method = 'GET';
    public $proxy = null;
    public $username = null;
    public $password = null;
    public $curlopts = null;
    public $debug_mode = false;
    public $request_class = 'BCS_RequestCore';
    public $response_class = 'BCS_ResponseCore';
    public $useragent = 'BCS_RequestCore/1.4.3';
    public $read_file = null;
    public $read_stream = null;
    public $read_stream_size = null;
    public $read_stream_read = 0;
    public $write_file = null;
    public $write_stream = null;
    public $seek_position = null;
    public $registered_streaming_read_callback = null;
    public $registered_streaming_write_callback = null;

    public function __construct($url = null, $proxy = null, $helpers = null)
    {
        if ($url) $this->request_url = $url;
        if ($proxy) $this->proxy = $proxy;
        if ($helpers) {
            if (isset($helpers['request']) && !empty($helpers['request'])) $this->request_class = $helpers['request'];
            if (isset($helpers['response']) && !empty($helpers['response'])) $this->response_class = $helpers['response'];
        }
    }

    public function __destruct()
    {
        if (isset($this->read_file) && isset($this->read_stream)) {
            fclose($this->read_stream);
        }
        if (isset($this->write_file) && isset($this->write_stream)) {
            fclose($this->write_stream);
        }
    }

    public function set_credentials($user, $pass)
    {
        $this->username = $user;
        $this->password = $pass;
        return $this;
    }

    public function add_header($key, $value)
    {
        $this->request_headers[$key] = $value;
        return $this;
    }

    public function remove_header($key)
    {
        if (isset($this->request_headers[$key])) {
            unset($this->request_headers[$key]);
        }
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_method($method)
    {
        $this->method = strtoupper($method);
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_useragent($ua)
    {
        $this->useragent = $ua;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_body($body)
    {
        $this->request_body = $body;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_request_url($url)
    {
        $this->request_url = $url;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_curlopts($curlopts)
    {
        $this->curlopts = $curlopts;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_stream_size($size)
    {
        $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_stream($resource, $size = null)
    {
        $this->read_stream = $resource;
        if ($size) $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_file($location)
    {
        $this->read_file = $location;
        $this->read_stream = fopen($location, 'rb');
        if ($this->read_stream !== false && $this->read_stream_size === null) {
            $stats = fstat($this->read_stream);
            $this->read_stream_size = $stats['size'];
        }
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_write_stream($resource)
    {
        $this->write_stream = $resource;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_write_file($location)
    {
        $this->write_file = $location;
        $this->write_stream = fopen($location, 'wb');
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_proxy($proxy)
    {
        $this->proxy = $proxy;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_seek_position($position)
    {
        $this->seek_position = $position;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_read_callback($callback)
    {
        $this->registered_streaming_read_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_write_callback($callback)
    {
        $this->registered_streaming_write_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function streaming_read_callback($curl_handle, $file_handle, $length)
    {
        if ($this->read_stream_read >= $this->read_stream_size) {
            return '';
        }
        if ($this->seek_position !== null && $this->read_stream_read == 0) {
            fseek($this->read_stream, $this->seek_position);
        }
        $read = fread($this->read_stream, min($this->read_stream_size - $this->read_stream_read, $length));
        $this->read_stream_read += strlen($read);
        if ($this->registered_streaming_read_callback) {
            call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_read_callback, $curl_handle, $file_handle, $read);
        }
        return $read;
    }

    public function streaming_write_callback($curl_handle, $data)
    {
        $length = strlen($data);
        $written_total = 0;
        $written_last = 0;
        while ($written_total < $length) {
            $written_last = fwrite($this->write_stream, substr($data, $written_total));
            if ($written_last === false) {
                return $written_total;
            }
            $written_total += $written_last;
        }
        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_write_callback, $curl_handle, $data);
        }
        return $written_total;
    }

    public function prep_request()
    {
        $curl_handle = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILETIME, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_FRESH_CONNECT, false);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS, 5);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 5184000);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, 120);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOSIGNAL, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_REFERER, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, array($this, 'streaming_read_callback'));
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, array($this, 'streaming_write_callback'));
        if ($this->debug_mode) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, true);
        }
        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPPROXYTUNNEL, true);
            $proxy = parse_url($this->proxy);
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXY, $proxy['host']);
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXYPORT, $proxy['port']);
            if (isset($proxy['user']) && isset($proxy['pass'])) {
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXYUSERPWD, $proxy['user'] . ':' . $proxy['pass']);
            }
        }
        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH, CURLAUTH_ANY);
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, $this->username . ':' . $this->password);
        }
        if (extension_loaded('zlib')) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_ENCODING, '');
        }
        $request_headers = array();
        foreach ($this->request_headers as $header => $value) {
            if (strtolower(substr($header, 0, 10)) == 'x-bce-') {
                $request_headers[] = $header . ':' . $value;
            } else {
                $request_headers[] = $header . ': ' . $value;
            }
        }
        if (!isset($this->request_headers['Expect'])) {
            $request_headers[] = 'Expect:';
        }
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $request_headers);
        switch ($this->method) {
            case 'PUT':
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PUT');
                if ($this->read_stream) {
                    curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_PUT, true);
                    curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILE, $this->read_stream);
                    curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
                } else {
                    curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
                }
                break;
            case 'POST':
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_POST, true);
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
                break;
            case 'HEAD':
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'HEAD');
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOBODY, true);
                break;
            case 'DELETE':
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
                break;
            default:
                break;
        }
        if ($this->curlopts) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $opt => $val) {
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, $opt, $val);
            }
        }
        return $curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle = null, $response = null)
    {
        if ($curl_handle && $response === null) {
            $response = curl_exec($curl_handle);
            $this->response = $response;
        }
        $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $this->response_headers = substr($response, 0, $header_size);
        $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);
        $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
        $headers = array();
        $header_text = $this->response_headers;
        foreach (explode("\r\n", $header_text) as $header) {
            $pos = strpos($header, ':');
            if ($pos !== false) {
                $key = str_replace('-', '_', strtolower(substr($header, 0, $pos)));
                $value = trim(substr($header, $pos + 1));
                if (isset($headers[$key])) {
                    if (is_array($headers[$key])) {
                        $headers[$key][] = $value;
                    } else {
                        $headers[$key] = array($headers[$key], $value);
                    }
                } else {
                    $headers[$key] = $value;
                }
            } elseif (strlen($header) > 0) {
                $headers[] = $header;
            }
        }
        $this->response_headers = $headers;
        $response_class = $this->response_class;
        return new $response_class($this->response_headers, $this->response_body, $this->response_code, $this->response_info);
    }

    public function send_request($parse = false)
    {
        set_time_limit(0);
        $curl_handle = $this->prep_request();
        if ($this->write_file || $this->write_stream) {
            $this->response = curl_exec($curl_handle);
        } else {
            $this->response = curl_exec($curl_handle);
        }
        $response = $this->process_response($curl_handle, $this->response);
        curl_close($curl_handle);
        return $parse ? $response->body : $response;
    }

    public function isBaeEnv()
    {
        return isset($_SERVER['HTTP_BAE_ENV_APPID']);
    }

    public function get_response_header($header = null)
    {
        if ($header) {
            $header = str_replace('-', '_', strtolower($header));
            return isset($this->response_headers[$header]) ? $this->response_headers[$header] : null;
        }
        return $this->response_headers;
    }

    public function get_response_body()
    {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function get_response_code()
    {
        return $this->response_code;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a PHP class for interacting with Alipay's API to process refund requests, including request signing and HTTP communication using cURL.

Class Description: The AlipayService class provides functionality to prepare and send refund requests to Alipay's payment gateway. It handles request signing, parameter encoding, and HTTP communication while maintaining necessary configuration parameters.

Attributes:
- appId: string - Alipay application ID
- returnUrl: string - URL for returning after payment
- notifyUrl: string - URL for payment notifications
- charset: string - Character encoding (default: 'utf-8')
- rsaPrivateKey: string - RSA private key for request signing
- outTradeNo: string - Merchant's unique order number
- tradeNo: string - Alipay's transaction number
- refundAmount: string - Amount to be refunded

Methods:
- __construct() -> void - Initializes the class with default charset
- setAppid(string $appid) -> void - Sets the Alipay application ID
- setRsaPrivateKey(string $saPrivateKey) -> void - Sets the RSA private key
- setOutTradeNo(string $outTradeNo) -> void - Sets the merchant's order number
- settradeNo(string $tradeNo) -> void - Sets Alipay's transaction number
- setRefundAmount(string $refundAmount) -> void - Sets the refund amount
- doRefund() -> array - Processes refund request and returns response
- generateSign(array $params, string $signType = "RSA") -> string - Generates request signature
- sign(string $data, string $signType = "RSA") -> string - Signs the request data
- checkEmpty(mixed $value) -> bool - Checks if value is empty
- getSignContent(array $params) -> string - Prepares string for signing
- characet(string $data, string $targetCharset) -> string - Handles character encoding conversion
- curlPost(string $url = '', mixed $postData = '', array $options = array()) -> string - Executes cURL POST request
right_result:
<?php
class AlipayService {
    protected $appId;
    protected $returnUrl;
    protected $notifyUrl;
    protected $charset = 'utf-8';
    protected $rsaPrivateKey;
    protected $outTradeNo;
    protected $tradeNo;
    protected $refundAmount;

    public function __construct() {
        $this->charset = 'utf-8';
    }

    public function setAppid($appid) {
        $this->appId = $appid;
    }

    public function setRsaPrivateKey($rsaPrivateKey) {
        $this->rsaPrivateKey = $rsaPrivateKey;
    }

    public function setOutTradeNo($outTradeNo) {
        $this->outTradeNo = $outTradeNo;
    }

    public function settradeNo($tradeNo) {
        $this->tradeNo = $tradeNo;
    }

    public function setRefundAmount($refundAmount) {
        $this->refundAmount = $refundAmount;
    }

    public function doRefund() {
        $params = array(
            'app_id' => $this->appId,
            'method' => 'alipay.trade.refund',
            'charset' => $this->charset,
            'sign_type' => 'RSA',
            'timestamp' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s'),
            'version' => '1.0',
            'biz_content' => json_encode(array(
                'out_trade_no' => $this->outTradeNo,
                'trade_no' => $this->tradeNo,
                'refund_amount' => $this->refundAmount
            ))
        );

        $params['sign'] = $this->generateSign($params);
        $url = 'https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do';
        $result = $this->curlPost($url, $params);
        return json_decode($result, true);
    }

    public function generateSign($params, $signType = "RSA") {
        return $this->sign($this->getSignContent($params), $signType);
    }

    public function sign($data, $signType = "RSA") {
        $res = "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\n" .
            wordwrap($this->rsaPrivateKey, 64, "\n", true) .
            "\n-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----";
        openssl_sign($data, $sign, $res, OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA256);
        $sign = base64_encode($sign);
        return $sign;
    }

    public function checkEmpty($value) {
        if (!isset($value))
            return true;
        if ($value === null)
            return true;
        if (trim($value) === "")
            return true;
        return false;
    }

    public function getSignContent($params) {
        ksort($params);
        $stringToBeSigned = "";
        $i = 0;
        foreach ($params as $k => $v) {
            if (false === $this->checkEmpty($v) && "@" != substr($v, 0, 1)) {
                if ($i == 0) {
                    $stringToBeSigned .= "$k" . "=" . "$v";
                } else {
                    $stringToBeSigned .= "&" . "$k" . "=" . "$v";
                }
                $i++;
            }
        }
        unset ($k, $v);
        return $stringToBeSigned;
    }

    public function characet($data, $targetCharset) {
        if (!empty($data)) {
            $fileType = $this->charset;
            if (strcasecmp($fileType, $targetCharset) != 0) {
                $data = mb_convert_encoding($data, $targetCharset, $fileType);
            }
        }
        return $data;
    }

    public function curlPost($url = '', $postData = '', $options = array()) {
        if (is_array($postData)) {
            $postData = http_build_query($postData);
        }
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postData);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 30);
        if (!empty($options)) {
            curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        }
        $data = curl_exec($ch);
        curl_close($ch);
        return $data;
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP function that performs HTTP requests using cURL, supporting both GET and POST methods, with optional SSL verification and file upload safety checks.

Function Description: The function makes HTTP requests to a specified URL, with optional POST data. It handles SSL verification automatically based on the URL scheme (https/http) and includes safety checks for file uploads. The function returns the raw response from the server.

Input:
- $url: string - The target URL for the HTTP request
- $data: mixed (optional) - Data to be sent with POST request (default: empty string)

Output:
- string - The raw response data from the server
- false - If the cURL request fails (though error handling is minimal in this implementation)
right_result:
<?php
function httpRequest($url, $data = '') {
    $ch = curl_init();
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS, 10);

    if (strpos($url, 'https://') === 0) {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, 2);
    } else {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, 0);
    }

    if (!empty($data)) {
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        if (is_array($data)) {
            foreach ($data as $key => $value) {
                if (is_file($value)) {
                    $data[$key] = new CURLFile($value);
                }
            }
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
        } else {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
        }
    }

    $response = curl_exec($ch);
    if ($response === false) {
        return false;
    }
    curl_close($ch);
    return $response;
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a PHP class for interacting with Alipay's payment gateway, specifically for processing bar code payments. The class should handle request configuration, signature generation, and HTTP communication with Alipay's API.

Class Description: The AlipayService class provides methods to configure and execute payments through Alipay's payment gateway. It handles parameter setting, request signing, and communication with Alipay's API endpoint.

Attributes:
- appId: [string] - The application ID provided by Alipay
- charset: [string] - Character encoding (default: 'utf-8')
- notifyUrl: [string] - URL for payment notifications
- rsaPrivateKey: [string] - RSA private key for signing requests
- totalFee: [string] - Total payment amount
- outTradeNo: [string] - Merchant's unique order number
- orderName: [string] - Description of the order
- authCode: [string] - Customer's payment authorization code

Methods:
- __construct() -> [void] - Initializes the class with default charset
- setAppid($appid) -> [void] - Sets the Alipay application ID
- setNotifyUrl($notifyUrl) -> [void] - Sets the notification URL
- setRsaPrivateKey($rsaPrivateKey) -> [void] - Sets the RSA private key
- setTotalFee($payAmount) -> [void] - Sets the payment amount
- setOutTradeNo($outTradeNo) -> [void] - Sets the merchant order number
- setOrderName($orderName) -> [void] - Sets the order description
- setAuthCode($authCode) -> [void] - Sets the customer's payment auth code
- doPay() -> [array] - Executes the payment request and returns the response
- curlPost($url, $postData, $options) -> [string] - Sends a POST request to the specified URL (private method)
- generateSign($params, $signType) -> [string] - Generates the request signature (private method, implementation not shown)
right_result:
<?php
class AlipayService {
    private $appId;
    private $charset = 'utf-8';
    private $notifyUrl;
    private $rsaPrivateKey;
    private $totalFee;
    private $outTradeNo;
    private $orderName;
    private $authCode;

    public function __construct() {
        $this->charset = 'utf-8';
    }

    public function setAppid($appid) {
        $this->appId = $appid;
    }

    public function setNotifyUrl($notifyUrl) {
        $this->notifyUrl = $notifyUrl;
    }

    public function setRsaPrivateKey($rsaPrivateKey) {
        $this->rsaPrivateKey = $rsaPrivateKey;
    }

    public function setTotalFee($payAmount) {
        $this->totalFee = $payAmount;
    }

    public function setOutTradeNo($outTradeNo) {
        $this->outTradeNo = $outTradeNo;
    }

    public function setOrderName($orderName) {
        $this->orderName = $orderName;
    }

    public function setAuthCode($authCode) {
        $this->authCode = $authCode;
    }

    public function doPay() {
        $bizContent = array(
            'out_trade_no' => $this->outTradeNo,
            'scene' => 'bar_code',
            'auth_code' => $this->authCode,
            'subject' => $this->orderName,
            'total_amount' => $this->totalFee,
            'timeout_express' => '5m'
        );

        $params = array(
            'app_id' => $this->appId,
            'method' => 'alipay.trade.pay',
            'charset' => $this->charset,
            'sign_type' => 'RSA2',
            'timestamp' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s'),
            'version' => '1.0',
            'notify_url' => $this->notifyUrl,
            'biz_content' => json_encode($bizContent)
        );

        $params['sign'] = $this->generateSign($params, 'RSA2');

        $url = 'https://openapi.alipay.com/gateway.do';
        $result = $this->curlPost($url, $params);
        return json_decode($result, true);
    }

    private function curlPost($url, $postData, $options = array()) {
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($postData));
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);

        if (!empty($options)) {
            curl_setopt_array($ch, $options);
        }

        $result = curl_exec($ch);
        curl_close($ch);
        return $result;
    }

    private function generateSign($params, $signType = 'RSA2') {
        ksort($params);
        $stringToBeSigned = '';
        foreach ($params as $k => $v) {
            if ($k != 'sign' && $v != '' && !is_array($v)) {
                $stringToBeSigned .= $k . '=' . $v . '&';
            }
        }
        $stringToBeSigned = rtrim($stringToBeSigned, '&');
        $res = openssl_get_privatekey($this->rsaPrivateKey);
        if ($signType == 'RSA2') {
            openssl_sign($stringToBeSigned, $sign, $res, OPENSSL_ALGO_SHA256);
        } else {
            openssl_sign($stringToBeSigned, $sign, $res);
        }
        openssl_free_key($res);
        return base64_encode($sign);
    }
}

Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP function that makes an HTTP POST request to the OpenAI API's image generation endpoint using cURL, with proper headers, timeout settings, and error handling.

Function Description: The function sends a POST request to the OpenAI API to generate images based on the provided input data. It sets up necessary headers including authentication, configures cURL options for secure communication (with SSL verification disabled for testing purposes), handles redirects, and manages timeout settings. The function returns the raw API response.

Input:
- $postData: [string] - JSON-encoded string containing the image generation parameters
- $OPENAI_API_KEY: [string] - The API key for authenticating with OpenAI's service

Output:
- [string] - The raw response data from the API call, which should be a JSON string containing either the generated image information or an error message
right_result:
<?php
function generateOpenAIImage($postData, $OPENAI_API_KEY) {
    $ch = curl_init();
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.openai.com/v1/images/generations');
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $postData);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
        'Content-Type: application/json',
        'Authorization: Bearer ' . $OPENAI_API_KEY
    ]);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS, 10);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 30);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);

    $response = curl_exec($ch);
    if (curl_errno($ch)) {
        $error = curl_error($ch);
        curl_close($ch);
        return json_encode(['error' => $error]);
    }
    curl_close($ch);
    return $response;
}
